attributes.action: to introduce a fresh policy that prevents the acquistion of alcoholic beverage for persons claiming unemployment benefits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should tax payers money be spent on frivilous personal indulgences that are counter productive to process of securing new employment. I am confident that this policy would yield strong support from the majority of the British public. I would like to propose the introduction of an ID scheme which will supoort the implementation and policing of this policy.
